mapper.select: select contract_id,contract_serial, merchant_name,second_phone,first_date,username from xmc_parkingspace where status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into xmc_parkingspace ( contract_id, contract_serial, contract_title2, merchant_name, contract_title3, offer, purpose, plate, contract_title4, year_start, month_start, day_start, year_end, month_end, day_end, service_charge, total, numeral_sed, year_rd, month_rd, day_rd, cash_deposit, numeral_five, payment_way, payment_time, remark, first_agent, first_date, second_sign, second_agent, second_phone, second_date, username, status ) values ( #{contract_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contract_serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contract_title2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchant_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contract_title3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contract_title4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year_start,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month_start,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{day_start,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year_end,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month_end,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{day_end,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{service_charge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numeral_sed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year_rd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month_rd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{day_rd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cash_deposit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numeral_five,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment_way,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payment_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{first_agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{first_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{second_sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{second_agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{second_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{second_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE xmc_parkingspace SET contract_serial = #{contract_serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_title2 = #{contract_title2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_title3 = #{contract_title3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_title4 = #{contract_title4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_name = #{merchant_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, offer = #{offer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purpose = #{purpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plate = #{plate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year_start = #{year_start,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month_start = #{month_start,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day_start = #{day_start,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year_end = #{year_end,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month_end = #{month_end,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day_end = #{day_end,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_charge = #{service_charge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total = #{total,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, numeral_sed = #{numeral_sed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year_rd = #{year_rd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month_rd = #{month_rd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, day_rd = #{day_rd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_deposit = #{cash_deposit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, numeral_five = #{numeral_five,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_way = #{payment_way,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_time = #{payment_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_agent = #{first_agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_date = #{first_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, second_sign = #{second_sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, second_agent = #{second_agent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, second_phone = #{second_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, second_date = #{second_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE contract_id = #{contract_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
